name: NEVERMINE (itch)
description:
Crawl Moonwards.

A psycho-cosmic experience.

NEVERMINE is a surreal and experimental interactive fiction game.  Meet a talking crow,  escape your memories, face Humanity's Corpse. 

Playtime of 45-60 minutes. Four endings.

------------------------

an entity, standing at the center of the intersection.
it takes me a few more flashes to discern the shape, but i see.
a figure... one mishapen and bent, but a figure... and i recognise it.
that is what was behind the door. that is what i am running from.
but it's here?
...
"what are you?"

------------------------

Featuring music by the wonderful Amy Rogers. Find her Bandcamp here.
